org.apache.abdera2.activities.protocol.basic
Class BasicAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.abdera2.common.protocol.AbstractCollectionAdapter
      org.apache.abdera2.activities.protocol.AbstractActivitiesCollectionAdapter
          org.apache.abdera2.activities.protocol.managed.ManagedCollectionAdapter
              org.apache.abdera2.activities.protocol.basic.BasicAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.abdera2.common.protocol.CollectionAdapter, org.apache.abdera2.common.protocol.CollectionInfo, org.apache.abdera2.common.protocol.MediaCollectionAdapter, org.apache.abdera2.common.protocol.Transactional
public abstract class BasicAdapter
extends ManagedCollectionAdapter

The BasicAdapter provides a simplistic interface for working with Atompub collections with a restricted set of options/features. The idea of the basic adapter is to make it easy to provide a minimally capable Atompub server
